sentences.sContent: He died after five days of excruciating torture.
sentences.sCn: 遭受了五天的严刑拷打之后，他死了。

sentences.sContent: The waiting must be torture for you.
sentences.sCn: 这样的等待对你来说肯定是一种煎熬。

sentences.sContent: Political opponents of the regime may be tortured.
sentences.sCn: 这个政权的政治异己可能会遭受酷刑。
